page.title: 20POOL STREET CHURCH GRESLEY
page.content: This was once{Pool Village.}Five firms now have premises there.{Mason Cash}is a pottery established in 1901. It em- ploys 85 people and exports pottery. { Neville Lumb & Co Ltd}is a plumber's merchant.They buy baths,toilets,wash- basins,showers and all accessories and sell them to builders.25 people are em ployed.{Merlin Automatics}repair fruit machines,jukeboxes and pool tables.The firm has 13 employees. { Simkin & Day}deal with used cars and sell the parts to private companies & garages.They have been there 4 years & employ 11 people.Only half the car parts are used,the rest go for scrap. {Gaskells}store goods in a warehouse. We saw bags of plastic chips & stacks of tins for making aerosol cans.They have 2 forklifts & 8 vans for deliver- ies & furniture removal.6 people work there.None of these firms exports.
